4.5 Building an Automation controller application

4.5.4 Getting and setting the value of a dispatch property

Automation controllers can use get-property, page 218, to read the value of a property with a known Dispatch ID: 

let value = get-property(dispinterface, disp-ID);

They can use set-property, page 220, to set the value of a property with a known Dispatch ID to a new-value: 

set-property(dispinterface, disp-ID, new-value);
OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
